_source.title: New TimeLion Sheet
timelion_sheet: .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours' ).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('sum of hours').title('this is the title'), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').mvavg(7).label('trend').trend('log', start=10, end=-10), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours', offset=-1y).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('year before')

_source.title: timelion test
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"timelion test","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours' ).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('sum of hours').title('this is the title'), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').mvavg(7).label('trend').trend('log', start=10, end=-10), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours', offset=-1y).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('year before')","interval":"auto"}}

_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"test timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours' ).mvavg(7).label('sum of hours').title('this is the title'), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').mvavg(7).label('trend').trend('log', start=10, end=-10), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours', offset=-1y).mvavg(7).label('year before')","interval":"1w"}}

_source.title: Percentage spent of allocated budget (Timelion TEST)
Percentage spent of allocated budget (Timelion TEST)
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"Percentage spent of allocated budget (Timelion TEST)","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').cusum().divide(.es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='avg:mpsBudget'))","interval":"auto"}}
